game.description: The ancient temple of the long-forgotten civilization has been desecrated by dark forces. The once-peaceful village is now plagued by evil creatures and dark magic.
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen artifact from the dark cult's lair.

tasks.description: Gather information about the dark cult from the villagers and travelers.
Infiltrate the dark cult's hideout in the nearby forest and gather intel on their plans.
Retrieve the stolen artifact from the lair of the dark cult leader.
tasks.objective: Defeat the cult leader and retrieve the artifact

game.title: The Lost Artifact
